page.title: 11RECREATION CONTINUED
page.content: could go again but that was another week. Many people like to come to our area to walk,or to birdwatch,or other activities associated with open countryside.We live right on the edge of the Peak District National Park and on weekends in the Summer the local roads are quite busy with travellers from Manchester and other cities. Sport is a popular recreation.Soccer is one our favourite games,played mostly by males. Cricket is another popular game played in the Summer. Many of the local public houses have darts teams and many pubs also have pool tables. In school the boys play football and the girls play netball.In the Summer we play rounders.We play matches against other schools in these games.
